item.title: Overview
item.description: Once the data is stored in our Datawarehouse we can share to your company depending on your TravelgateX relationship: Partners: already connected to our platform, such as OTAs and Wholesalers, will have access to accurate date regarding their performance, ratios, prices, product usage… With this data, accurate benchmarking against competitors is made clear so that our partners can to gain a competitive advantage. We do this without ever exposing our partnersâ€™ data , we create anonymous dynamic competitive sets.
